Batman: Gotham Knights #27
Publisher:  DC Comics

Writers:  Devin Grayson
Pencillers:  Roger Robinson

"Bruce Wayne: Fugitive" part 2. A fugitive from justice, Batman brutally punishes the criminal element of Gotham City, and is surprised when he's paid an unwanted visit by the Man of Steel. Meanwhile, Alfred searches for more clues to the murder that's been pinned on Bruce Wayne.
